name: Chana Gassi /Ghassi - Mangalorean Coconut Onion sauce with Chickpeas.
description: Chana Ghassi /Gassi - Mangalorean Coconut Onion sauce with Chickpeas. Simplified adaptation of Regional Indian Curry from Coastal Karnataka. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe.Serves 2 to 4 depending on how you serve the stew and appetite.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup dried chickpeas ( soaked for atleast 4 hours)
1/4 tsp black peppercorns (less for less heat)
1/3 cup shredded coconut (, dried or fresh/frozen)
1 tsp oil (, organic safflower or other neutral oil)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the chickpeas if you havent already, See notes for making with cooked chickpeas. Heat a skillet over medium heat. Toast the coriander seeds, chilies and black pepper until the seeds start changing color. Add coconut and mix in. Roast for half a minute or until coconut starts to get golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the chickpeas if you havent already, See notes for making with cooked chickpeas. Heat a skillet over medium heat. Toast the coriander seeds, chilies and black pepper until the seeds start changing color. Add coconut and mix in. Roast for half a minute or until coconut starts to get golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a blender. Add onion, garlic, cinnamon, water and blend until the coconut breaks down. *(Some onion and garlic can turn bitter on blending for long. When in doubt, blend the coconut,water and spices, then add onion and garlic and blend in short pulses till a coarse mixture, or use finely chopped onion and garlic instead of blended).

When in doubt, blend the coconut,water and spices, then add onion and garlic and blend in short pulses till a coarse mixture, or use finely chopped onion and garlic instead of blended).

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blended mixture to Instant pot or pressure cooker. Add turmeric and 1/2 tsp salt and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the blended mixture to Instant pot or pressure cooker. Add turmeric and 1/2 tsp salt and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and wash the chickpeas, add to the pot with 1 cup water and mix in. Cook on Manual (hi) for 35 to 40 minutes. Release the pressure after 10 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain and wash the chickpeas, add to the pot with 1 cup water and mix in. Cook on Manual (hi) for 35 to 40 minutes. Release the pressure after 10 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tamarind, lemon, and additional salt if needed. Add cayenne if needed and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tamarind, lemon, and additional salt if needed. Add cayenne if needed and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the tempering. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds and cook until the mustard seeds splutter. Add curry leaves carefully. Take off heat and mix into the chickpeas. Serve hot with rice or flatbread.
